headshot.title: Jill Bradshaw, headshot via Editor, 4:47:45 AM 12/22/2020

datoCmsKey.bio: Hey there! My name is Jill (they/them/theirs pronouns) and I am a non-binary New York/Connecticut actor. I hold a Bachelor of Arts in Acting from Point Park Universityâ€™s Conservatory of Performing Arts. I am also a writer and some of my plays can be found on the New Play Exchange website. Feel free to contact me through any of my social media platforms or website if you are interested in collaborating!
